response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and potential for those who appreciate its craftsmanship and functionality. I am offering this exquisite piece to you at a special price of $750,000. This is a rare chance to own something truly exceptional, tailored to elevate your collection or fulfill a specific need. I believe in the intrinsic value this product can bring to your life or business, and I am confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 750000}
